review: I bought the firestick very recently.  On the plus side navigation is easy and intuitive and I havent had any trouble streaming video so, but on the negative side I have experienced lag when streaming my Amazon music, which was a surprise since video worked so well  I've also had problems with lock ups when playing games, requiring multiple presses to get back to "Home" and then playing &!returning from a video in order to recover.  For those reasons I'm only giving the Firestick 3 stars.
author: Michael W Pyle

review: I went ahead and got one of these when they were on sale and I'm glad I did. I've never had any problems with it and it works great. We have Roku's on all our other TV's and I needed something for my kitchen TV. I decided to try this and I've very happy with it. Learning to work the menu was a little different since we've had Roku's so long, but once you do, it's no problem. Matter of fact, I now have a Roku in my kitchen because my son stole this Fire Stick from my TV to put in his room, I wish I would have gotten another one at the sale price.
